In 2024 the results of elections of Russian president was reported as high as 87%[^1] . That is inside Russia where freedom of speech is limited. Abroad the result is 72%.

[^1]: Official results of Russian president elections 2024

Let's look at demographics, who is voting?

Military - all voters at polling stations in military units relative to all voters in country.
